gpii_app_qss_settings_close.tooltip:
Close Morphic QuickStrip

You can reopen it using the Morphic Icon (below)

gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.tooltip: Undo the last change you made in the Morphic QuickStrip.
gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.title: Undo

gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.tooltip:
Resets computer to standard settings

(does not affect personal saved settings)
gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.title: Reset to Standard

gpii_app_qss_settings_save.tooltip: Save your preferences so you can use them on other computers that have Morphic installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_save.title: Запиши

tooltip.keyedIn:
Opens Morphic Settings Panel

Where you can quickly adjust often-changed settings of yours.
tooltip.keyedOut:
Opens Morphic Settings Panel

Where you can sign in to apply your saved personal settings.

gpii_app_qss_settings_more.tooltip: More options for changing the settings on this computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_more.title:
MORE...

(& HELP)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tooltip: Turn “Select to Read Aloud” extension in Chrome browser on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: Read Aloud
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tip: Turns on and adjusts Read Aloud mode in Chrome
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.extendedTip:
To use Read Aloud

  1. Open web page in Chrome
  2. Select / highlight text
  3. Click Play button that pops up

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.

Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, Chrome, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: High / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors

Works in Chrome, Windows and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some programs)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change whole screen to make everything larger/smaller.

Works for everything.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: Screen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Zooms everything on the screen

Amount of Zoom up and down differs by computer.

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Change text size.

Works in Windows, Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and many other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Приближи Приложение / Текст
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zooms one application.

Works in many applications

-- for the Window on top.

(Not a setting so won't Save.)
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: You can also use the “CTRL” key, plus SCROLL (wheel or gesture) to do App/Text Zoom without using Morphic.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change Windows language setting.

Works for menus, etc. in Windows, Edge, and many other applications that have Language Packs installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: Език
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Changes Language of Windows

Works in Windows and programs that support Windows language settings.

  • Does not change the language in documents or files.
  • May need to restart some programs.

gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tooltip: Отваря всички USB флашки свързани с компютъра.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.title: Отвори USB
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tip:
Вашето USB Устройство

Поставете USB устройство и го отворете с бутона по-долу.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.footerTip:
Когато сте готови, предотвратете загуба на данни като премахнете USB устройствата безопасно.

  1. Затворете всички отворени документи от USB устройството и
  2. Тогава използвайте бутона по долу за да премахнете безопасно USB устройствата

gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tooltip:
Направи Снимка.

Вземи снимка или видео от екрана си.
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.title: Направи Снимка
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tip:
Направи Снимка

Използвайте бутоните по-долу да направите снимка, или видео на екрана си. Моля спазвайте Закона за авторските права!

  • Изполвайте мишката, за да избере зона и цъкнете, за да направите снимката.
  • Кликнете и влачете по екрана за избиране на зона.
